39561.summary: Some customers in the Abasand Heights area of Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39561.title: July 14 – Fort McMurray (Abasand Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
